snippet: The company said it had reached an agreement in principle with its pilots’ union, advancing the carrier’s effort to integrate its staff after the 2010 merger creating the company.
abstract: United Continental Holdings reaches an agreement in principle with it's pilots' union, advancing the carrier’s effort to integrate its staff after the 2010 merger creating the company.
lead_paragraph: The company said it had reached an agreement in principle with its pilots’ union, advancing the carrier’s effort to integrate its staff after the 2010 merger creating the company.

headline.main: United Continental Reaches a Deal With Its Pilots
headline.print_headline: United Continental Reaches a Deal With Its Pilots
